name: The Block Pro
title: Rapid Insights The Pudgy Penguin Airdrop
text:
Synopsis
Pudgy Penguins is expanding its ecosystem by launching a PENGU token on Solana, diverging from its existing Ethereum-based NFT collections, which could signal a strategic multi-chain approach in the crypto gaming and NFT space.

Key Insights
- Pudgy Penguins announced an airdrop for its PENGU token on December 6, 2024, with launch on December 17, 2024
- The PENGU token is being launched on Solana, while existing Pudgy Penguins NFTs (Lil Pudgys and Pudgy Rogs) remain on Ethereum
- December 2024 saw a 5.9% decrease in total adjusted on-chain volume to $670 billion
- Bitcoin's on-chain volume decreased by 5.4% to $450 billion
- Ethereum's on-chain volume decreased by 6.9% to $220 billion
- Ronin blockchain emerged as a standout in the 2024 gaming sector, ranking 4th in active addresses and transaction count
- Layer 1 blockchains in 2024 saw growth driven by consumer applications, with chains prioritizing scalability, low fees, and user experience performing best
